summary: American private-eye Harry Kilmer returns to Japan to rescue a friend's kidnapped daughter from the clutches of the Yakuza.
cast: Robert Mitchum|Ken Takakura|Brian Keith|Herb Edelman|Richard Jordan|Keiko Kishi|Eiji Okada|James Shigeta|Kyôsuke Machida|Christina Kokubo|Eiji Gô|Lee Chirillo|M. Hisaka|William Ross|Akiyama|Harada
title: Yakuza
